programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Two Jack Russell terriers, Ruby and Jinx, show how dogs communicate through energy and body language.

programme.desc: An American Eskimo dog attacks doors and windows whenever people pass; a shiba inu overprotects his corgi playmate; two bulldogs are aggressive.

programme.desc: Expert Cesar Millan rehabilitates dogs with behavioral issues.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A feral dog refuses to be caught; the addition of an English bulldog disrupts the harmonious relationship of a boxer and a cocker spaniel; a pit bull terrier refuses to go for walks.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A pit bull/chow mix has an extreme fear of the stove; a Rottweiler and a German shepherd battle for control; a Jack Russell terrier cannot handle the loss of its pack leader.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A family's new Great Dane moves in on its other dog's territory; Cesar helps Los Angeles' animal-control department with its new pet-ownership program.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: TV personality Ed McMahon has an aggressive wheaten terrier; a beagle does not leave the house; an Australian shepherd is so territorial no one has visited his home in years.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A widow's retriever mix and two fox terriers do not get along; a Shar-Pei/Doberman mix drools excessively on car rides; Cesar revisits a Rottweiler mix.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: At an army base, Cesar helps an Australian shepherd scared of men in uniform and a Shetland shepherd who barks non-stop when planes fly overhead.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps two former gang members through Homeboy Industries, an outreach program designed to break the cycle of gang violence but who have problem dogs at home.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps Melody and Tom, who is so terrified of dogs that he will even leave a job site if one is near, deal with their fears and anxieties.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Pointer mix is fixated on pinecones, while an Australian shepherd whines every time his owner switches on the vacuum cleaner.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Young fans Jessica and Rachel join Cesar as he deals with a tiny dog with an outsized personality and a nervous pit bull mix afraid of the sea.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps owners of rescue dogs including a terrier mix that screams and a Belgian Tervuren scared of her own home; Cesar helps a family adopting their first dog.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar travels to the U.K. to help troubled dog owners with a territorial street dog and a dalmatian whose personality can turn ugly.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: British problem dogs including wild German Shepherds, a dog that must be muzzled by court order, and an English cocker spaniel that hates cars.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Problem dogs in the U.K. including two dogs that spent most of their lives in Africa, and a barking Jack Russell terrier mix.

programme.desc: Cesar's English adventure ends with an aggressive klee kai, a collie mix that hates walks, and a hyper Labrador.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar brings discipline to four chaotic Chinese crested dogs, an over-energetic mastiff mix and two unruly miniature dachshunds.
